# South Indian Nutrition Calculator

This project is a web-based nutrition calculator specifically designed for South Indian cuisine, targeting two adults aged 41 years with a daily calorie target of 1700 calories.

## Project Overview
- **Target Users**: Two adults, 41 years old
- **Daily Calorie Target**: 1700 calories per person
- **Cuisine Focus**: South Indian food items
- **Technology Stack**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- **Features**: 
  - Food search and selection
  - Nutritional value calculation
  - Daily intake tracking
  - Food habit recommendations

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML structure
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Clean, modern CSS styling
- Vanilla JavaScript for functionality
- Focus on South Indian dishes and ingredients
- Include comprehensive nutritional database
